translation.en: -[man 1, muffled] Hot enough for you? -[woman 1] She's tried everything.
translation.de: Heiß genug? Sie hat alles versucht.

translation.en: [woman 2] What about the looks she was getting…
translation.de: Und die Blicke, die sie erntete…

translation.en: [man 2] We were all, frankly, keen on…
[woman 3] No, it's not right for a girl.
[woman 4] …giving you any more money to…
-[man 2] Look at it this way… -[woman 5] It's simple to me.
[man 3] I must stay away from…
[woman 6] Feels like the whole city is out today.
[woman 7] Summer sales.
translation.de: Schlussverkauf. Die New Yorker lieben eben Angebote.

translation.en: -Can't keep a New Yorker from a bargain. -[woman 6] Ain't that the truth?
translation.de: Schlussverkauf. Die New Yorker lieben eben Angebote. Nicht wahr?

translation.en: Let's get to the toy store and out of this heat.
translation.de: Ab zum Spielzeugladen und ins Kühle.

translation.en: I'll never hear the end of it if I don't get my niece a doll.
translation.de: Ohne Puppe darf ich nicht zu meiner Nichte.

translation.en: [woman 7] She asking for some special sort? They have those ones with darling hair you can braid.
translation.de: Will sie eine bestimmte? Manchen kann man die Haare flechten.

translation.en: -[woman 6] Yes, maybe she'd like that. -[man 6 whistles] Taxi!
translation.de: -Ja, so eine wäre gut. Ich weiß nicht. -Taxi!

translation.en: -[woman 6] Oh. -[woman 7] There now, that's better. [woman 6] Look at that precious little pickaninny one.
translation.de: -Endlich. Viel besser. -Oh, diese hübsche kleine Negerpuppe.

translation.en: -That, she'll love. -No.
[woman 6] She's never even met a colored who didn't work for us. Thank heavens.
translation.de: Sie kennt keine Farbigen, die nicht für uns arbeiten.

translation.en: No, never mind, ladies. Accidents will happen.
translation.de: Kein Problem, Ladys. Das kann passieren.

translation.en: -[woman 6] My goodness. -Here you are.
-[shopper] Here. -[woman 6] Oh! Thank you.
-What a nice lady. -[woman 6] Mm-hmm.
[clerk] There you go, miss. Thank you so much.
-[woman 8] Thank you. -[girl] Mama, I want that one.
[shopper] Do you have the Mother Goose Drawing and Tracing Book?
[clerk] All sold out.
Figures. I've tried all over town. My son won't settle for anything but.
translation.de: Klar. Ich war schon überall. Mein Sohn will nichts anderes.

translation.en: [clerk] Try again in a couple weeks. Might get lucky.
translation.de: Versuchen Sie's in ein paar Wochen.

translation.en: -His birthday's tomorrow. -[clerk] Well, better luck next time.
[clerk] Thank you.
[man 1] Mister? Hey, are you all right, sir?
Please, somebody, help me. I… I… Help me out.
He's fallen down. Sir, can you hear me?
translation.de: Er fiel um. Hören Sie mich?

translation.en: [man 2] Sir. Sir, you all right?
-[woman] What's happened? -I don't know.
[woman] He all right?
[driver] This heat. Feels like I'm about to pass out myself.
translation.de: Diese Hitze. Ich kippe selber fast um.

translation.en: Yes. I guess it's tea I need. I'm a little faint.
translation.de: Ja. Ich brauche wohl Tee. Ich bin matt.

translation.en: [driver] The Drayton, ma'am? They do say as how there's always a breeze up there.
translation.de: Das Drayton, Ma'am? Da soll es immer eine Brise geben.

translation.en: -[shopper] The Drayton would be lovely. -[indistinct chatter]
[man] Oh! Taxi!
Take him to a hospital.
Thank you.
-Good afternoon. -Good afternoon.
[man 1] The waiter will be with you.
[woman 1 whispering] Stop it.
-Now? -[man 2] Yes, now.
[woman 1] You satisfied?
[man 3] See you later. [woman 2] Don't be long. I'll get another one.
translation.de: -Bis dann. -Beeil dich. Ich nehme noch einen.

translation.en: [man 3] I won't. I hope.
-You'll be all right? -[woman 2] I'll be just fine.
I'm going to sit here and enjoy this cool room.
translation.de: Ich sitze hier und genieße die Kühle.

translation.en: -[man 3] All right. -[woman 2] All right.
-[man 3] I suppose I should… -[woman 2] I suppose you should.
translation.de: -Ich sollte jetzt wohl… -Ja, solltest du wohl.

translation.en: [man 2] We'll be married soon.
translation.de: -Wir sind zwei ledige Verliebte. -Wir sind bald verheiratet.

translation.en: As far as they know, we are.
translation.de: Für sie sind wir es schon.

translation.en: Pardon me. I don't mean to stare, but I think I know you.
translation.de: Verzeihung. Ich wollte nicht starren. Ich glaube, ich kenne Sie.

translation.en: [shopper] I'm afraid you're mistaken.
No, of course I know you, Rene.
You look just the same. Tell me, do they still call you Rene?
translation.de: Du siehst wie damals aus. Nennen sie dich immer noch Rene?

translation.en: [Irene] Yes, though no one's called me that for a long time.
translation.de: Ja, aber mich hat schon lange keiner mehr so genannt.

translation.en: Don't you know me?
Not really, Rene?
I'm afraid I can't seem to place…
-Clare? -[Clare] Mm-hmm.
That's right.
-Not Clare Kendry? -[Clare] Mm-hmm.
Now, don't run away.
You simply must stay and talk.
Fancy meeting you here. It's simply too lucky.
translation.de: So was, dich hier zu treffen. So ein Glücksfall.

translation.en: It's awfully surprising, yes.
I'd never have known you if you hadn't laughed.
translation.de: Ich habe dich nur am Lachen erkannt.

translation.en: You've changed so. Well, it's been 12 years at least.
translation.de: -Du hast dich verändert. -Es ist mindestens 12 Jahre her.

translation.en: You know, I almost dropped by your father's house not so long ago.
translation.de: Vor Kurzem hätte ich fast deinen Vater besucht.

translation.en: I've thought of you so often.
-You have? -[Clare] Of course.
You know, since I've been here, I've hoped I might run into someone.
translation.de: Seit ich herkam, hoffte ich, jemanden zu treffen.

translation.en: Preferably you, though. And now you're here.
translation.de: Am liebsten natürlich dich. Und jetzt bist du hier.

translation.en: I'll wager you haven't given me a thought.
translation.de: Du dachtest sicher nicht an mich.

translation.en: So…
Tell me.
I want to know everything. Married? Children?
translation.de: Ich will alles wissen. Verheiratet? Kinder?

translation.en: -Yes. Two boys. You? -Mm-hmm.
One girl. Margery. She's my angel.
translation.de: Ein Mädchen. Margery. Sie ist mein Engel.

translation.en: My husband John's here on business. Banking business. In this heat! Can you imagine?
translation.de: Mein Mann John ist wegen Bankgeschäften hier. Bei der Hitze.

translation.en: That was your husband?
[chuckles softly] We've been here a whole week from Chicago. That's home.
translation.de: Wir sind hier seit einer Woche. Wir leben in Chicago.

translation.en: Although I come here and remember what home really is.
translation.de: Obwohl das hier mehr wie ein Zuhause ist.

translation.en: Well, we can see lots of one another these days that I'm here, can't we?
translation.de: Na ja, wir können uns oft sehen, solange ich hier bin, oder?

translation.en: I don't know… I mean… I'm just…
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht… Ich meine… Ich…

translation.en: I live in Harlem, still.
translation.de: Ich lebe in Harlem. Immer noch.

translation.en: I don't come to this part of town a whole lot.
Oh, that's sad.
Perhaps I can come visit with you another time in Harlem?
translation.de: Vielleicht kann ich dich in Harlem besuchen.

translation.en: Meet your boys?
We're here quite often. And if this trip goes well, well, John's quite sure we'll move.
translation.de: Wir sind oft hier. Wenn alles gut läuft, ziehen wir hierher, meint John.

translation.en: It's my dream to come back, Rene.
I'm sure.
does he…
Know?
Let's go up to my suite, where we can talk properly.
translation.de: Lass uns in meiner Suite reden.

translation.en: Waiter!
Ugh. I can't bear this heat! I have to change.
translation.de: Die Hitze bringt mich um. Ich muss mich umziehen.

translation.en: John'll be back soon.
And here I am, sweatin' up a storm.
translation.de: Und ich schwitze hier wie verrückt.

translation.en: -That's nice. -Oh!
I found Gert Johnson in the phone book. Well, Gertrude Martin now.
translation.de: Gert Johnson ist im Telefonbuch. Jetzt Gertrude Martin.

translation.en: She married Fred. Remember? Yes. I haven't seen Fred for an unmentionable time.
translation.de: -Sie hat Fred geheiratet. Weißt du noch? -Ja. Ich sah Fred schon lange nicht mehr.

translation.en: Well, they have twins. Isn't that wonderful? -Mmm. -Boys. Oh, I'd love boys.
translation.de: Sie haben Zwillinge. Wunderbar, oder? Jungs. Ich hätte gerne Jungs.

translation.en: I'd never risk it again, though.
I went through hell those nine months for fear Margery might turn out dark.
translation.de: Ich hatte Angst, dass Margery dunkel wird.

translation.en: Mine are dark.
Oh. And your husband, he…
He… couldn't exactly "pass," if that's what you mean.
translation.de: -Und dein Mann… -Er… Er könnte nicht "durchgehen", falls du das meinst.

translation.en: Oh, I thought…
Oh, well, then. [chuckles]
Would you?
Would you?
Well, anyway, she goes as white.
translation.de: Tja, sie geht als weiß durch.

translation.en: -So, you haven't ever thought to? -What?
I'm asking if you ever thought of passing, Rene.
No, why should I?
I mean, for convenience, occasionally, I suppose. But no.
translation.de: Ich meine, manchmal, wegen der Annehmlichkeiten. Aber nein.

translation.en: I just mean I have everything I've ever wanted.
translation.de: Ich habe doch alles, was ich je wollte.

translation.en: Except perhaps a little more money. [scoffs]
Of course. That's all anybody ever wants, a little more money.
translation.de: Das wollen natürlich alle. Etwas mehr Geld.

translation.en: Money's an awfully nice thing to have.
translation.de: Es ist sehr schön, Geld zu haben.

translation.en: In fact, all things considered, I think it's entirely worth the price.
translation.de: Insgesamt gesehen finde ich, das war den Preis wert.

translation.en: I should go, Clare.
I'm not sure it's such a good idea if John…
translation.de: Es wäre nicht so gut, wenn John…

translation.en: Oh, no, Rene, it is.
Oh, you must stay a little while longer. Oh, please say you'll stay.
translation.de: Du musst noch bleiben. Bitte sag, dass du bleibst.

translation.en: Hang it! I've made a mess.
Give me a second, and I'll order us some food up here.
translation.de: Warte kurz. Ich bestelle Essen aufs Zimmer.

translation.en: All right.
Whatcha thinking, Rene?
You're curious, is that it?
You can ask me anything. Anything you want.
translation.de: Du kannst fragen, was du willst.

translation.en: What have you told him… of your family?
translation.de: Was hast du ihm erzählt? Über deine Familie?

translation.en: You know, I haven't had to worry as much as you'd think.
translation.de: Tja, es war nicht so problematisch, wie du denkst.

translation.en: There were my aunts, you see. They took me in after Father died and gave me a home of sorts.
translation.de: Meine Tanten boten mir eine Art Zuhause, nachdem mein Vater starb.

translation.en: [exhales deeply] Very white, very respectable, very religious.
translation.de: Sehr weiß. Sehr respektabel. Sehr religiös.

translation.en: I met John not long after,
and as soon as I turned 18 and legal, we got married and…
translation.de: und als ich 18 und volljährig war, haben wir geheiratet und…

translation.en: well, went off and left for good.
translation.de: Tja, dann gingen wir für immer weg.

translation.en: And you're happy?
Of course, Rene.
As you say, I have everything I ever wanted.
translation.de: Ich habe alles, was ich je wollte.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Clare, that was rude of me.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, das war unhöflich.

translation.en: Of course you're happy. -Look at you. -[Clare chuckles]
translation.de: Natürlich bist du glücklich. Das sieht man doch.

translation.en: -And your daughter? -Margery? Oh, she's divine.
John wants to put her in one of those Swiss boarding schools in the fall.
translation.de: John will sie im Herbst auf ein Schweizer Internat schicken.

translation.en: I dare say she'll get quite the education. Not like anything we had.
translation.de: Da bekommt sie richtige Bildung. Nicht das, was wir hatten.

translation.en: Room service, hello?
We want cakes. The most beautiful cakes you have.
translation.de: Wir wollen Kuchen. Die schönsten Kuchen, die Sie haben.

translation.en: Tell me, what tea you got passes for French champagne?
translation.de: Sagen Sie mir, welcher Ihrer Tees als Champagner durchgeht.

translation.en: Oh, I'm messing!
Yes, we'll take a pitcher of iced tea in champagne flutes.
translation.de: Ja, wir nehmen einen Krug Eistee und Champagnergläser.

translation.en: Mm-hmm. We're celebrating.
-[Irene] That's enough, thank you. -Have a drop more. You've hardly had any.
translation.de: -Das reicht, danke. -Bitte, du hast kaum was getrunken.

translation.en: -[John] Nig? -John, dear! [kisses]
I ran into an old, old friend of mine from school.
translation.de: Ich traf zufällig eine alte Schulfreundin.

translation.en: Irene Westover. Irene, this is my husband, John Bellew.
translation.de: Irene Westover. Irene, das ist mein Mann, John Bellew.

translation.en: Pleasure to meet you, Mrs. Westover.
-Actually, it's Mrs. Redfield. -[John] Mm.
Oh, of course, I… I didn't even think to ask.
translation.de: Natürlich, ich… Ich habe gar nicht gefragt.

translation.en: I am sorry if I've interrupted.
translation.de: Entschuldigt die Störung. Kriege ich einen Drink, Liebling?

translation.en: -Will you get me a drink, honey? -[Clare] Here.
translation.de: Entschuldigt die Störung. Kriege ich einen Drink, Liebling? -Hier. -Danke.

translation.en: [John] Thank you.
So, what do you say, then? To old friends?
translation.de: Worauf stoßen wir an? Auf alte Freundinnen?

translation.en: -To old friends! -To old friends.
-Did you hear what John called me, Rene? -Oh, Clare, please.
translation.de: -Hast du gehört, wie John mich nennt? -Clare, bitte.

translation.en: [Clare] No, go on, tell her why.
[John chuckles] Oh, it's silly.
When we were first married, this woman was as white as a lily.
translation.de: Als wir geheiratet haben, war die Frau so weiß wie eine Lilie.

translation.en: But as the years go by, she seems to be getting darker and darker.
translation.de: Aber im Laufe der Jahre scheint sie immer dunkler zu werden.

translation.en: So I told her, "If you don't look out, you'll wake up one morning and find that you've turned into a nigger."
translation.de: Ich sagte ihr: "Wenn du nicht aufpasst, wachst du mal als eine Niggerin auf."

translation.en: Yeah. She's been Nig ever since.
That's good!
Well, it's silly.
No, that's… That's…
That's good.
My goodness, John!
After all these years, what would it matter if you found out that I was 1 or 2% colored, hmm?
translation.de: Was würde es jetzt noch ausmachen, wäre ich zu 1 oder 2 Prozent farbig?

translation.en: Well, you can turn as black as you please, as far as I'm concerned.
translation.de: Von mir aus kannst du so Schwarz werden, wie du willst.

translation.en: I know you're not colored.
So, you dislike Negroes, Mr. Bellew?
No, no, no, not at all. I hate them.
translation.de: Nein, so ist das nicht. Ich hasse sie.

translation.en: But not as much as Nig does, for all she's trying to turn into one.
translation.de: Aber nicht so sehr wie Nig, obwohl sie alles tut, um so zu werden.

translation.en: Why, she won't have them near her, not even as a maid.
translation.de: Sie will sie nicht mal als Hausmädchen.

translation.en: Isn't that true?
Have you ever known any Negroes?
[John] No, no, but I do know people who know them.
translation.de: Nein, aber ich kenne Leute, die welche kennen.

translation.en: And I read about them in the papers, of course.
translation.de: Und ich lese über sie in der Zeitung.

translation.en: Terrible mess. Robbing, killing.
[sighs] It's sad, really.
John, Rene doesn't want to hear about your pet perversions.
translation.de: John, Rene will nichts von deinen Lieblingsärgernissen hören.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I didn't mean to bore you.
You live nearby?
Fairly.
[John] It's a great city, New York. City of the future.
translation.de: New York ist eine tolle Stadt. Die Stadt der Zukunft.

translation.en: -What line of work is your husband in? -He's a doctor.
translation.de: -Als was arbeitet Ihr Mann? -Er ist Arzt.

translation.en: -[John] That's an interesting life. -[Irene] Yes. Hard. Nerve-racking too.
Wife's nerves, too, I bet. All those lady patients.
translation.de: Sicher auch für die Frau. Bei den ganzen Patientinnen.

translation.en: John, dear, don't start! More tea, Rene?
translation.de: John, lass das! Noch mehr Tee, Rene?

translation.en: I've taken up too much of your time already.
translation.de: Ich habe schon zu viel deiner Zeit beansprucht.

translation.en: Oh, but we're just getting started!
-Thank you for the drink. -[John] I'll see you out.
[Clare] Rene.
-I do hope to see you soon. -Goodbye, Mrs. Redfield.
-Glad to have met you. -[Irene] Goodbye, Clare.
-[Irene] Evening, Lance. -Evening.
Where you been?
Lookin' for that darn book.
-They eat? -I think so.
I was gonna put them to bed, but…
translation.de: Ich wollte sie ins Bett bringen…

translation.en: -But you fell asleep. -Apparently.
Am I still sleeping?
Catch it!
Pass, pass.
[husband] Hey. Come here.
-I thought you nailed this already. -[son 1] I forget sometimes.
translation.de: -Ich dachte, du kannst das. -Ich komme durcheinander.

translation.en: [husband] All right, ten minutes.
-[son 1] Catch the ball, okay? -[son 2] I don't want to.
[son 1] Don't lose it.
It's boring. Play with me.
[son 2] Just leave me alone.
Damn!
-Caught! -[gasps] Damn it!
Brian, why you gotta be creepin' around the place like that?
translation.de: Brian, warum schleichst du dich immer an?

translation.en: Profanity, miss!
They'll be late for school.
I'm not gonna have time to make it to my next call if I have to drop you.
translation.de: Ich schaffe es nicht zum nächsten Termin, wenn ich dich absetze.

translation.en: -[maid] Boys, come on in. -Irene?
translation.de: Jungs, kommt rein. -Irene? -Ja, ihr müsst jetzt herkommen.

translation.en: [maid] Yes, yes, you have to come on in now.
Sorry, honey.
I was just thinking how much Junior is getting like you.
translation.de: Ich dachte daran, wie Junior dir ähnlicher wird.

translation.en: I wonder if he isn't going too fast in school.
translation.de: Geht die Schule nicht zu schnell?

translation.en: It's easy to forget he's younger.
I wish you wouldn't be ever fretting about those boys.
translation.de: Sorge dich nicht immer so um die Jungs.

translation.en: They are fine. They're perfectly good, strong, healthy boys.
translation.de: Sie kommen klar. Sie sind gute, starke, gesunde Jungs.

translation.en: I suppose.
I'm just afraid he's picked up some queer ideas about things from some of the older boys.
translation.de: Ich fürchte, dass ihm die älteren Jungs Flausen in den Kopf setzen.

translation.en: "Queer"? What about?
You know, things young boys be thinking about.
translation.de: Na ja, was eben Jungs so im Kopf haben.

translation.en: Ah. You mean about sex?
Yes. Jokes. Things like that.
If sex isn't a joke, what is it?
translation.de: Sex ist doch ein Witz, oder?

translation.en: -What is a joke? -Don't be facetious.
You ready?
No, you go. I'll take the bus.
translation.de: Nein, fahrt ruhig. Ich nehme den Bus.

translation.en: -Pick you up, then? -Please. From the printing office.
translation.de: -Soll ich dich abholen? -Bitte. Von der Druckerei.

translation.en: I need to see about more handbills and tickets for the dance.
translation.de: Ich brauche Flugblätter und Tickets für den Ball.

translation.en: They should be paying you.
It isn't charity work if they pay me for it.
-[maid] Go on, boys. -[Brian] Are we ready?
[Irene] Lickety-split!
-Come back. -Are you ready?
-I'm fast. -Let's go.
-Go on, boys, get. -Junior.
-[son 2] I don't wanna go! -[Brian] You have to, I'm afraid.
[Junior] Bye, Mama.
-I'm too fast! Can't catch me. -[son 2] Get back here.
translation.de: -Ich bin zu schnell für dich! -Komm her.

translation.en: -You want grapefruit, ma'am? -Mm-hmm.
Thank you.
Ugh, my hat.
Oh, Ms. Redfield, you forgot one.
Thank you.
-Do you want me to drive? -Mmm.
Yeah, sure.
Everything set?
We're a month away and all the bookings are gone, not counting the door.
translation.de: Noch ein Monat und schon ausgebucht. Ohne Tageskarten.

translation.en: -Busy as a cat with fleas myself. -Ain't you cold?
translation.de: -Ich habe auch zu tun. -Ist dir nicht kalt?

translation.en: No, leave it, if you're not cold.
translation.de: Lass, wenn dir nicht kalt ist.

translation.en: [sighs] This city!
I think I'm beginning to hate sick people.
Their stupid meddling families, their dirty, smelly rooms--
translation.de: Ihre dummen, aufdringlichen Familien, die ekligen Zimmer…

translation.en: Come on, now. It's just a bad day. You don't mean that. You're helping those sick people.
translation.de: Du hattest einen miesen Tag. Du meinst es nicht so. Du hilfst Kranken.

translation.en: -Let's not talk about it. -You brought it up.
-Put the window down. -Thought you were cold.
Now I'm saying I can't breathe. Put the window down.
translation.de: Jetzt kriege ich keine Luft. Mach's auf.

translation.en: I know you think trying somewhere else would be easier for us.
translation.de: Du denkst, woanders wäre es leichter für uns.

translation.en: South America or some such. And to a point, I agree.
translation.de: Südamerika oder so. Zum Teil stimme ich zu. Wir sollten weggehen.

translation.en: We should go abroad somewhere.
translation.de: Zum Teil stimme ich zu. Wir sollten weggehen.

translation.en: Not for a while, of course, but when the boys leave…
translation.de: Nicht sofort, aber wenn die Jungs groß sind…

translation.en: -We can visit Brazil. -Visit?
Or I was thinking of one of them European schools for Junior.
translation.de: Oder Junior könnte in Europa zur Schule gehen.

translation.en: You are going to make a mollycoddle out of that boy.
Ted is the one who needs your attention, not Junior,
and you needn't think I'll let you send Junior to some nice kindergarten school
translation.de: und ich lasse dich Junior nicht in eine Kindergartenschule schicken,

translation.en: 'cause he's getting a much-needed education.
Sooner he learns about sex, the better. Certainly if he learns it's a grand joke.
translation.de: Er sollte schnell lernen, dass Sex nur ein riesiger Witz ist.

translation.en: The greatest in the world.
-What's that supposed to mean? -Nothing.
I'm just getting a little tired of playing second fiddle
translation.de: Ich bin es nur langsam leid, im Schatten deiner geliebten Negro League zu stehen.

translation.en: to your precious Negro League, that's all.
translation.de: im Schatten deiner geliebten Negro League zu stehen. Sonst nichts.

translation.en: How about a little charity for this Negro?
translation.de: Tu was Wohltätiges für diesen Negro.

translation.en: [Irene] Come on, now. There's people looking.
What's this?
-I think it's from Clare Bellew. -Clare Bellew?
translation.de: -Der ist wohl von Clare Bellew. -Clare Bellew?

translation.en: [grunts] That woman from Chicago you told me about running into?
translation.de: Die aus Chicago, die du getroffen hast?

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -You gonna see her again?
I haven't opened the letter.
-It's postmarked New York. -I know.
-They must've moved here. -Brian, I'm not going to see her.
translation.de: -Sie sind wohl hergezogen. -Ich treffe sie nicht.

translation.en: Thought you were good friends in school.
Brian, darling, I'd have to be an idiot not to realize
translation.de: Brian, ich bin nicht so dumm, um nicht zu merken,

translation.en: if a man calls me a you-know-what, it's his fault the first time,
translation.de: dass es bei der ersten Beschimpfung seine, bei der zweiten aber meine Schuld ist.

translation.en: but mine if I give him the opportunity to do it again.
translation.de: dass es bei der ersten Beschimpfung seine, bei der zweiten aber meine Schuld ist. Stimmt.

translation.en: Sure, sure.
May I?
"I am so lonely, so lonely…"
"Cannot help longing to be with you again."
-Don't mock her. That's not fair. -I'm just reading it. [chuckles]
translation.de: -Mach dich nicht lustig. Das ist unfair. -Ich lese nur.

translation.en: Fine.
"You can't know how in this pale life of mine,
translation.de: "Du hast keine Ahnung, wie sehr ich in meinem fahlen Leben

translation.en: I am all the time seeing the bright pictures of that other
translation.de: immer die leuchtenden Bilder des anderen vor Augen habe,

translation.en: that I thought I was so glad to be free of."
translation.de: das ich so gern abgeschüttelt hatte."

translation.en: Oh, come on, it's funny! She's very dramatic.
translation.de: Gib's zu, es ist lustig. Dramatisch.

translation.en: "It may be, Rene dear,
that your way may be the wiser and infinitely happier one."
translation.de: ist dein Weg der weisere und unendlich glücklichere."

translation.en: I'm flattered. "Wiser." As if anything could rectify the humiliation…
translation.de: Wie schmeichelnd. "Weiser." Als würde das die Demütigung…

translation.en: Wait, wait, there's more.
"I wouldn't feel this wild desire… if I hadn't seen you."
translation.de: "Ich hätte nicht dieses wilde Verlangen, hätte ich dich nicht getroffen."

translation.en: That's rich.
Blaming you.
"Wild desire."
Don't give her an inch.
What you so angry for anyhow?
-Husband didn't call you a-- -No, but he would've.
translation.de: -Er nannte nicht dich… -Nein, hätte er aber.

translation.en: It amounts to the same thing.
[Brian] It has, you will admit, its humorous side.
translation.de: Aber gib zu, es hat was Lustiges.

translation.en: [Irene] No, I won't.
It's not funny, it's revolting.
Irene, leave it, huh? It's normal. They always come back.
translation.de: Irene, lass es. Das ist normal. Sie kommen immer zurück.

translation.en: They have to work hard at getting there, why would they wanna come back?
translation.de: Es ist so anstrengend, dort anzukommen. Warum zurück?

translation.en: If I knew that, I'd know what race is. You'd think they'd be satisfied being white.
translation.de: -Keine Ahnung. Ethnische Zugehörigkeit? -Sie müssten als Weiße zufrieden sein.

translation.en: Rot! Who's satisfied being anything?
I am.
Satisfied.
I am.
-[Brian] Let's go. Wait, Junior! -Come on, boys.
-Books, books. -Bye, Mama.
[Junior] Bye, Mama.
-[chuckles] Bye. -[door closes]
I got yams for tonight. Save the chicken for tomorrow.
translation.de: Ich habe Yams gekauft. Mach das Huhn morgen.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
-Did you clean the boys' room already? -Not yet.
Well, hurry. They'll be back soon and then it'll be impossible.
translation.de: Schnell. Wenn sie zurück sind, wird es nicht möglich sein.

translation.en: Can I get you something?
No. I can get it.
Redfield residence.
Yes, hello.
It's Mr. Wentworth.
Hello. Yes, Hugh.
Oh, quite, and you?
Every single one, honest. I know…
Wait, I'll give mine to Bianca. I won't need it anyway.
translation.de: Halt, ich gebe meinen Bianca. Ich brauche ihn eh nicht.

translation.en: -[door opens] -No, I mean it.
It was silly of me not to, I'll be so busy…
translation.de: Ich dachte nicht daran. Ich werde zu tun haben…

translation.en: Well, as long as Brian has a place to drop down now and then…
translation.de: Solange Brian sich ab und zu hinsetzen kann…

translation.en: That's nice. My love to Bianca.
translation.de: Das ist nett. Grüßen Sie Bianca von mir.

translation.en: Yes, I'll see to it right away. See you tomorrow, Hugh. Bye.
translation.de: Ja, ich kümmere mich sofort. Bis morgen, Hugh. Tschüss.

translation.en: [gasps, chuckles] Dear God, but aren't you lovely, Clare.
translation.de: Mein Gott, du siehst so hübsch aus, Clare.

translation.en: Didn't you mean to answer my letter, Rene?
Every day I went to that nasty little post office.
translation.de: Ich war täglich auf diesem miesen Postamt.

translation.en: They thought I was having an affair and the man had thrown me over.
translation.de: Die dachten sicher, meine Affäre hat mich sitzenlassen.

translation.en: -Oh! Clare, I… -Well…
Eventually it sunk in. You hadn't written to me and didn't intend to.
translation.de: Irgendwann wurde mir klar, dass du nicht antworten willst.

translation.en: I tried very hard to forget, I really did, but I couldn't.
translation.de: Ich wollte es vergessen, aber es ging nicht.

translation.en: I had to know why. That's why I came here.
translation.de: Ich musste erfahren, warum. Deshalb bin ich hier.

translation.en: Why didn't you write to me, Rene?
You see…
Well… you see…
I can't help thinking that…
you ought not to…
ought not to come up here.
-You mean you don't want me here. -No. What I said, you ought not to run the risk.
translation.de: -Du willst mich nicht. -Nein. Du solltest es nicht riskieren.

translation.en: It's terribly foolish. You must see that, and, well…
translation.de: Es ist sehr dumm, wie dir sicher einleuchtet, und, na ja…

translation.en: just not the right thing.
Rene, you are priceless. The right thing?
-I mean, it isn't safe. -Safe?
To come up here. Considering what I saw of Mr. Bellew's attitude.
Oh, of course, I understand.
And I don't blame you for being angry, Rene.
You acted beautifully that day, really beautifully. Thank you.
translation.de: Du hast neulich wunderbar reagiert. Wirklich wunderbar. Danke.

translation.en: I don't want thanks.
I just mean that… it was very kind of you to be so delicate about it.
translation.de: Ich meine ja nur, dass es nett war, dass du so feinfühlig warst.

translation.en: What other option did I have, Clare?
I have been furious at you, really furious.
translation.de: Ich war wirklich wütend auf dich.

translation.en: -Putting me in that position. -Of course.
I can't see why you wouldn't understand why I wouldn't write.
translation.de: Ist doch klar, dass ich dir nicht schreibe.

translation.en: Foolish of me. Why I wouldn't want anything to do with you!
translation.de: -Dumm von mir. -Und dass ich keinen Kontakt will.

translation.en: Oh, no, now…
-Don't cry. -[sobbing]
I just… I feel so terrible about it all.
translation.de: Es… Es tut mir einfach so leid.

translation.en: Oh, I… I didn't think…
I'm so very sorry, Rene.
translation.de: Es tut mir so leid, Rene.

translation.en: There, there. Don't be.
I'm sorry too.
Oh, darn it. The truth is I'm very glad to see you, Clare.
translation.de: Verdammt, eigentlich bin ich froh, dich zu sehen.

translation.en: Very.
Oh, and I you, Rene. You can't imagine.
translation.de: Ich auch, Rene. Du glaubst nicht wie.

translation.en: Without that day, I would've got to the end, unable to speak to anyone.
translation.de: Ohne diesen Tag hätte ich mit niemandem reden können.

translation.en: [chuckles] You can't know. Never anyone to really talk to.
translation.de: Das verstehst du nicht. Ich habe niemanden zum Reden.

translation.en: It was insensitive of me not to think about that.
translation.de: Wie unsensibel, dass ich das nicht bedachte.

translation.en: Oh, I don't expect you to understand.
You're happy.
You have a true, good life, and you're free.
translation.de: Du hast ein wirklich schönes Leben, und du bist frei.

translation.en: Free and safe.
Safe. [scoffs]
I don't even know what that is anymore.
translation.de: Ich kenne das gar nicht mehr.

translation.en: I'm beginning to believe that no one is ever completely happy, free, or safe.
translation.de: Ich glaube langsam, niemand ist ganz glücklich, frei oder sicher.

translation.en: Well, then, what does it matter if I come up here sometimes?
translation.de: Was macht es dann, wenn ich mal herkomme?

translation.en: You have a child, Clare. It's not just a matter of your safety.
translation.de: Du hast ein Kind, Clare. Es geht nicht nur um deine Sicherheit.

translation.en: Being a mother is the cruelest thing in the world.
translation.de: Mutter zu sein, ist das Grausamste.

translation.en: -[maid] Hello. Redfield residence. -Yes.
[maid] One moment… And the most responsible.
Mr. Wentworth is on the telephone again, ma'am.
translation.de: Mr. Wentworth ist wieder am Apparat.

translation.en: [Irene] Excuse me.
Hello?
Oh, honestly, Hugh, tell her to stop being silly. I've told you it's fine.
translation.de: Wirklich, Hugh, sagen Sie ihr, sie soll nicht albern sein. Es ist ok.

translation.en: Mm-hmm. See you tomorrow.
You sound busy.
It's this Negro Welfare League dance tomorrow.
I'm on the organizational committee. I am the committee, pretty much.
translation.de: Ich bin im Organisationskomitee. Na ja, ich bin das Komitee.

translation.en: -Hugh Wentworth, the novelist? -Yes. Do you know him?
translation.de: -Der Schriftsteller Hugh Wentworth? -Ja. Kennst du ihn?

translation.en: -I've read a book or two of his. -You have?
-They're good, aren't they? -I suppose.
Sort of contemptuous.
Yes. Well, he's a dear, really. Mind if I do some things around the house?
translation.de: Ja. Na ja, er ist wirklich nett. Darf ich mich ums Haus kümmern?

translation.en: -I wasn't expecting guests. -Oh, I don't mind.
You can show me your home.
So, Hugh Wentworth's coming up to your dance, huh?
translation.de: Hugh Wentworth kommt also zu deinem Ball, ja?

translation.en: [chuckles] Yes. Why not?
Curious to me.
A man like that going to a Negro dance.
translation.de: Dass so ein Mann zu Schwarzen kommt.

translation.en: Hundreds of white people like Hugh come to affairs in Harlem now
translation.de: Viele Weiße wie du kommen jetzt nach Harlem.

translation.en: -Why? -Same reason you're here. To see Negroes.
translation.de: -Warum? -Sie wollen so wie du Schwarze sehen.

translation.en: What are you doing, boys?
To enjoy themselves, to get material,
to gaze on the great and near-great as they gaze on the Negroes.
translation.de: bestaunen die Großen, wie sie Schwarze bestaunen.

translation.en: Rene, suppose I come too?
-Why, because so many white people go? -No, because it'll be fun.
translation.de: -Warum? Weil viele Weiße kommen? -Nein, weil es sicher toll wird.

translation.en: I don't know. What if somebody recognizes you?
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht. Was, wenn dich jemand erkennt?

translation.en: I'll take my chances on getting by.
-You'll be bored stiff. -I won't, honestly. I won't.
-I won't be able to look after you. -I'll be as good as gold.
translation.de: -Ich werde keine Zeit haben. -Ich benehme mich.

translation.en: I'll just sit there and gaze at the great and not-so-great.
translation.de: Ich sitze einfach nur da und bestaune die Großen.

translation.en: Look, I don't care what you do or where you go,
translation.de: Hör mal, mir ist egal, was du wo tust.

translation.en: but I don't see why you should put yourself in a place that might bring you trouble.
translation.de: Aber warum willst du es riskieren, Ärger zu bekommen?

translation.en: Damn John!
He gets in the way of everything I want. I could kill him.
translation.de: Er ist nur im Wege. Ich könnte ihn töten.

translation.en: I wouldn't.
There's still capital punishment in this state, at least.
translation.de: Es gibt noch die Todesstrafe, zumindest hier.

translation.en: I want so much to be around Negroes again.
translation.de: Ich will wieder unter Schwarzen sein,

translation.en: Talk with them, hear them laugh.
translation.de: mit ihnen reden, sie lachen hören.

translation.en: I've almost forgotten it…
Damn!
-Shall I go down? -No, it's nothing.
Zu will clean it.
Come to the dance if you want to. I'm not going to stop you.
translation.de: Komm ruhig zum Ball. Ich halte dich nicht ab.

translation.en: [Clare] Thank you, Rene. That's so kind of you. Really, thank you.
translation.de: Danke, Rene. Das ist so lieb von dir. Vielen Dank.

translation.en: [Irene] Boys?
-[Junior] What do you want? We're busy. -[Irene] Junior.
Oh, now, don't be cross. I know I've gone and spoiled everything,
translation.de: Nicht sauer sein. Ich weiß, ich habe alles verdorben,

translation.en: but if I promise not to get in the way, will you let me in?
translation.de: aber wenn ich nicht störe, darf ich dann rein?

translation.en: It will just be us for dinner.
It's just as well. I don't have any more for more.
translation.de: Das ist gut. Für mehr ist nicht genug da.

translation.en: Well, they were the cowboys and I was the Indian,
translation.de: Tja, sie waren die Cowboys, und ich war der Indianer,

translation.en: and they captured me right outside the fort.
translation.de: und sie schnappten mich am Fort.

translation.en: But I think I just made my getaway.
Pay him no attention. Junior gets ahead of himself fast.
translation.de: Achte nicht auf ihn. Junior ist oft aufgedreht.

translation.en: Mmm. What's cooking? Yams? How you fixin' them?
translation.de: Was gibt es? Yams? Wie kochst du sie?

translation.en: -Butter, salt, sugar. Simple. -[giggles] Simple!
Why, it's just about the most perfect taste on God's earth!
translation.de: Das ist doch der perfekteste Geschmack auf Gottes Erde.

translation.en: Where did you find her, Rene?
I long for a maid who knows real home cookin'.
translation.de: Ich sehne mich nach einer guten Köchin.

translation.en: -[Irene] It's not like that. -Not like what?
translation.de: -So ist das nicht. -Wie ist das nicht?

translation.en: Everyone needs help. It's normal.
translation.de: Jeder braucht Hilfe. Das ist normal.

translation.en: -Maybe next time you can stay for dinner. -Oh, please, yes.
translation.de: -Vielleicht isst du nächstes Mal mit uns. -Oh, bitte, ja.

translation.en: How about I stop by tomorrow and we can go to the dance together?
translation.de: Ich könnte euch morgen zum Ball hier abholen.

translation.en: All right.
-All right. See you tomorrow, then. -Tomorrow. Yes.
-Bye, Rene. -[Irene] Mm.
-All right, come on in. -I didn't get a chance yet.
-Thought you might've fallen asleep. -No. Out on time. For once.
translation.de: -Ich dachte, du schläfst schon. -Nein. Du bist pünktlich. Ausnahmsweise.

translation.en: Ooh, good.
-You nervous? -Hey, get off. You're sitting on my dress.
translation.de: -Bist du nervös? -Hey, runter. Du sitzt auf meinem Kleid.

translation.en: -Clare's coming. Clare Bellew. -Hmm?
-That crazy woman, Clare? -Her, yes, her.
Crazy woman Clare Bellew.
-She's not crazy. -Since when?
Just… different.
She surprised me with a visit yesterday.
translation.de: Sie kam gestern überraschend zu Besuch.

translation.en: Yesterday? Why in the world didn't you tell me?
-Don't know. I had a lot to think about. -Irene.
translation.de: -Weiß nicht. Hatte viel um die Ohren. -Irene.

translation.en: She made it sound not such a problem if she came with us, so… I said fine.
translation.de: Sie klang, als sei es in Ordnung, wenn sie mitkommt, also stimmte ich zu.

translation.en: -She's coming here? -Any minute, I would think.
Be nice, huh?
I highly doubt it.
I mean, you be nice to her.
translation.de: Du sollst nett zu ihr sein.

translation.en: I will be polite.
[Irene] Gonna dress or lie there?
Quit hovering. Go wait for me downstairs.
translation.de: Stör nicht. Warte unten auf mich.

translation.en: Wait, I'm sorry. I love you.
translation.de: Halt, tut mir leid. Ich liebe dich.

translation.en: Boy! You are nervous.
[Clare] Oh, I thought I'd never get better.
I had such a fever. I thought I'd die. Truly.
translation.de: Ich dachte, ich sterbe vor Fieber.

translation.en: [Brian] It was quite the epidemic. I can't recall how many cases I treated.
translation.de: War eine Epidemie. Ich hatte unzählige Fälle zu behandeln.

translation.en: -Not all of them made it. -Mmm.
-So you're lucky. -Yeah.
[Brian] Of course, many more survived on my watch.
-[Clare giggles] -I'm not bragging. [Clare] And what if you are?
-It's worth bragging about if it's true. -[chuckles] You may be right.
translation.de: -Mit der Wahrheit darf man angeben. -Da könnten Sie recht haben.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I didn't realize you were here already.
translation.de: Oh, ich wusste nicht, dass du da bist.

translation.en: Don't worry. We made our own introductions. Yeah, we did.
-You look lovely, Rene. -[Brian] Mm-hmm.
I'm afraid I may have chosen all wrong.
translation.de: Ich habe wohl das Falsche ausgesucht.

translation.en: Rot! It's perfect.
-[Junior] …do it again. -[Ted] You told me.
Here they are!
Well, how do I look?
-Like a princess. -[giggling]
All right, all right.
-Good night and good night. -[Irene] Good night.
I feel exactly as I used to the night before Christmas.
translation.de: Ich fühle mich wie früher vor Weihnachten.

translation.en: I knew there was a surprise waiting for me, but I could never guess what.
translation.de: Ich wusste, es wartet eine Überraschung. Aber welche?

translation.en: -Ah. -I'm so excited. -You can't possibly imagine. -[car horn honks]
-"You can't possibly imagine." -[Irene] Stop now.
-[woman] Hi. -[upbeat jazz music playing]
-[indistinct chatter] -[woman] That music sounds good.
[man] They'll be there.
Bianca, I am outraged.
There's Hugh!
[Brian] Anywhere to sit?
In that booth with Hugh if we can get there.
translation.de: In Hughs Nische. Wenn wir hinkommen.

translation.en: [Clare] What a hoot!
[man] There he goes!
[laughing] Felise, Dave!
-It's a triumph! The band is peachy! -It's a riot!
translation.de: -So toll! Die Band ist wunderbar! -Echt super!

translation.en: -Come on, Brian. We're going dancing. -[Brian] What--
-Oh, no, no, no. -Oh, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes.
Look out, Clare. The man has two left feet.
translation.de: Vorsicht, er hat zwei linke Füße.

translation.en: -Is that true? -No.
-Yes, it's very true. Bit rusty. -[chuckles] -Well, let's give it a go. -All right.
translation.de: -Ist doch wahr. Etwas ungeübt. -Wir versuchen es.

translation.en: Okay.
"Poor man, rich man, beggar man, thief…" How's the rest of it go?
translation.de: "Kaiser, König, Edelmann…" Wie geht es weiter?

translation.en: [Hugh] "Doctor, lawyer, Indian chief." All here and a few more.
translation.de: "Bürger, Bauer, Bettelmann." Sie alle sind hier, und noch mehr.

translation.en: What I'm trying to find out is the history and status
translation.de: Ich wüsste sehr gern die Geschichte und den Status

translation.en: of the blonde beauty out of the fairy tale that you've brought along.
translation.de: der blonden Märchenfee, die Sie mitgebracht haben.

translation.en: [Clare] See?
[Hugh] The one currently seen dancing with your husband.
translation.de: Die gerade mit Ihrem Mann tanzt.

translation.en: She's a girl from Chicago I used to know. She's very excited I know you.
translation.de: Eine alte Bekannte aus Chicago. Sie ist begeistert, weil ich Sie kenne.

translation.en: -Good of her, I'm sure. -[chuckles]
[Hugh] Can you spot my wayward wife in the throng?
Ah, yes!
Ah. The usual problem.
All these gentlemen of color have driven a mere Nordic out of her mind.
translation.de: Schwarze Herren haben sie den nordischen Typ vergessen lassen.

translation.en: [Irene] Stop!
Have I laid eyes on her tonight except in spots here and there
translation.de: Habe ich sie heute gesehen, außer wenn sie irgendein Äthiopier herumwirbelte?

translation.en: being twirled about by some Ethiopian?
translation.de: außer wenn sie irgendein Äthiopier herumwirbelte?

translation.en: I have not.
Well, sir, you have to admit that the average colored man is a better dancer than the average white.
translation.de: Tja, Sir, Sie müssen zugeben, dass Farbige oft besser tanzen als Weiße.

translation.en: That is if the celebrities who find their way up here are fair specimens of your sort.
translation.de: Zumindest, wenn die Berühmtheiten hier Musterexemplare Ihrer Art sind.

translation.en: Having not tripped the light fantastic with any of the males,
translation.de: Da ich mit keinem der Männer hier das Tanzbein geschwungen habe,

translation.en: I am hardly in a position to argue the point.
translation.de: kann ich Ihnen wohl kaum widersprechen.

translation.en: [Hugh] Bianca and Co. are always raving on
translation.de: Bianca und ihre Freundinnen schwärmen immer

translation.en: about the good looks of some Negro, especially an unusually dark one.
translation.de: vom guten Aussehen eines Schwarzen, besonders eines besonders dunklen.

translation.en: Like Ralph Hazelton there.
Dozens of women have declared him fantastically handsome.
translation.de: Dutzende Frauen haben ihn zu einem irre gut aussehenden Mann erklärt.

translation.en: What do you think? Is he?
No. And I don't think anyone else would either.
translation.de: Nein. Das denken andere wohl auch nicht.

translation.en: It's just plain exoticism. An interest in what's different.
translation.de: Das ist nur die Exotik. Das Interesse am Andersartigen.

translation.en: A kind of emotional excitement…
Something you feel in the presence of something strange
translation.de: Was man in Anwesenheit von etwas Fremdem spürt,

translation.en: and, even perhaps, a bit repugnant to you.
translation.de: das man wohl sogar abstoßend findet.

translation.en: And there you have it.
So, do you subscribe to the notion that our motives for coming up here are predatory?
translation.de: Sind Sie auch der Meinung, dass wir hier nur auf Beute aus sind?

translation.en: [Irene] No.
More curious, I should say.
Like your princess from Chicago.
[Hugh] What is that supposed to mean?
Things aren't always what they seem, Hugh.
translation.de: Dinge sind nicht immer, wie sie scheinen.

translation.en: I'll be damned.
-Nobody could tell from looking at her. -[Hugh] No.
Most surprising.
Tell me, can you always tell the difference?
-Oh, now you really are sounding ignorant. -No, no, I mean it.
Feelings of kinship or something like that?
translation.de: Ein Gefühl der Verwandtschaft oder so?

translation.en: Stop talking to me like you're writing for the National Geographic.
translation.de: Sie reden, als schrieben Sie für den National Geographic.

translation.en: I can tell same as you.
translation.de: Ich sehe so viel wie Sie.

translation.en: And I suppose sometimes there is a…
a thing… a thing that can't be registered.
translation.de: das man nicht genau benennen kann.

translation.en: [Hugh] Yes, I understand what you mean.
translation.de: Ja, ich verstehe, was Sie meinen.

translation.en: Yet, lots of people pass all the time.
translation.de: Trotzdem gehen doch viele Leute als etwas anderes durch.

translation.en: It's easy for a Negro to pass for white. I'm not sure it would be so simple for a white person to pass for colored.
translation.de: Schwarze können als Weiße durchgehen, aber umgekehrt ist das sicher schwieriger.

translation.en: Never thought of that. No, Hugh. Why should you?
translation.de: -Darüber habe ich nie nachgedacht. -Nein, Hugh. Warum sollten Sie auch?

translation.en: Sometimes I think you could.
Yes.
And in a way, if you can, why wouldn't you?
Sorry. Hey.
-[Hugh] I'm asking, why wouldn't you? -Who's to say I'm not?
translation.de: -Warum tun Sie's nicht? -Wer sagt, dass ich's nicht tue?

translation.en: -You're being unusually cryptic this-- -And you are being an ass.
translation.de: -Sie benehmen sich mysteriös… -Und Sie sich wie ein Esel.

translation.en: I just mean…
we're all of us passing for something or other.
translation.de: Wir alle gehen als irgendwas durch.

translation.en: Aren't we?
An ass, am I?
Ah, my feet hurt like a… a marathon runner's.
translation.de: Meine Füße tun weh wie nach einem Marathon.

translation.en: I am in awe of your energy! [chuckles]
Well, I suppose I ought to go retrieve my wife
translation.de: Ich sollte wohl meine Frau da rausholen,

translation.en: before some man or other steals her away from me indefinitely.
translation.de: bevor irgendein Mann sie mir für immer raubt.

translation.en: Won't you dance with me, Mr. Wentworth?
translation.de: Wollen Sie nicht mit mir tanzen?

translation.en: It's not quite my strong suit, Ms. Bellew.
translation.de: Das ist nicht gerade meine Stärke, Ms. Bellew.

translation.en: -[Brian] Hugh. -Brian.
-Thank you. -And for you.
-Thank you. -Your husband has ruined me, Rene.
I must have another dance with him. He's the best here!
translation.de: Ich muss wieder mit ihm tanzen. Er ist der Beste hier.

translation.en: [chuckles] I guess my wife hasn't told you that I do not respond well to flattery.
translation.de: Ich muss wieder mit ihm tanzen. Er ist der Beste hier. Meine Frau sagte Ihnen wohl nicht, dass ich Schmeicheleien nicht vertrage.

translation.en: Uh, however, I would be more than happy
to find you a suitable replacement.
translation.de: suche ich Ihnen einen passenden Ersatz.

translation.en: Now, this… this is your man.
translation.de: Also, hier haben wir Ihren Mann.

translation.en: -[man] You? -[Clare] Yeah.
You'll do. Come along.
-[man] See ya. -[Irene laughs] He doesn't stand a chance.
[Brian] None whatsoever.
You know, I'm rather glad she came.
translation.de: Weißt du, ich bin froh, dass sie da war.

translation.en: Isn't she extraordinarily beautiful, though?
No, not particularly.
-You're fooling! -No.
I mean, she'd be a rather unusually good-looking white woman, I suppose.
translation.de: Sie würde sicher eine ungewöhnlich gut aussehende weiße Frau abgeben,

translation.en: But personally, I like my women darker.
translation.de: aber ich persönlich mag meine Frauen dunkler.

translation.en: -Yeah? -Mm-hmm.
Maybe it's just because she was so happy.
translation.de: Vielleicht war sie auch nur glücklich.

translation.en: Irene, watch yourself.
Don't find yourself responsible for that kind of happiness.
translation.de: Mach dich nicht für so ein Glück zuständig.

translation.en: [chuckles] Nonsense.
[man] Hey, can it!
[Junior] Clare?
[Ted] Goin' back to bed, Mama?
No, of course not, sweetie.
-Where's Clare? -She's coming later when you'll be in bed.
translation.de: -Wo ist Clare? -Wenn sie kommt, schlaft ihr schon.

translation.en: -But she sends you special kisses. -But Pa said she'd play with me.
translation.de: -Sie lässt euch küssen. -Pa sagte, sie spielt mit mir.

translation.en: Ted, take your brother to the kitchen and get something to eat.
translation.de: Ted, geh mit deinem Bruder in die Küche essen.

translation.en: I don't want something to eat.
-Ted, I said go take your… -'Scuse me.
Sorry. I told Junior Clare would be here.
translation.de: Ich sagte Junior, Clare wäre hier.

translation.en: What's that about?
Somebody called him a dirty…
you-know-what today.
-[Irene] Zulena? -Out back, Rene.
What in the world? Clare, aren't you freezing?
translation.de: Was ist das denn? Clare, frierst du nicht?

translation.en: When the Lord brings you a magical day like this, I say lap it up.
translation.de: Wenn der Herr so schönes Wetter gibt, nimm es an.

translation.en: You're crazy.
-Zu, can you help with these groceries? -They call this an Indian summer.
translation.de: -Zu, hilfst du mit dem Einkauf? -Das ist ein Altweibersommer.

translation.en: -An Indian summer? -Zu.
Zu and I were just talking about the Charlestons next door.
translation.de: Zu und ich redeten über die Charlestons nebenan.

translation.en: -That eldest girl is getting so pretty. -She is.
Ted can barely look at her.
-Puberty makes such a mess of friendships. -[Zulena] Puberty is a mess!
Amen to that! [chuckles]
I don't know.
You had a lot of friends, as I recall.
I suppose.
Sometimes I wonder why we weren't better friends.
translation.de: Warum waren wir nicht enger befreundet?

translation.en: Oh, we did all right.
I always admired you, though.
You were always so calm and beautiful in the face of everything.
translation.de: Du warst trotz allem immer ruhig und schön.

translation.en: Me? Come on, now.
You were always the beauty.
Not how I see it.
Staying for dinner? I can't.
John's coming home.
Oh, I thought next week.
Back early.
Misses me.
Can't say I feel the same. Wish he'd stay away always. [sighs]
translation.de: Beruht nicht auf Gegenseitigkeit. Er darf ruhig immer wegbleiben.

translation.en: -You mustn't say that. -Mustn't I?
Still coming to bridge?
Heaven forfend I miss the bridge, Rene!
translation.de: Gott verhüte, dass ich das verpasse.

translation.en: [Irene] "It was dusky inside and smelled like wood and oil."
translation.de: "Es war staubig und roch nach Holz und Öl.

translation.en: "She bumped her head on a light bulb dangling from the ceiling."
translation.de: Sie stieß mit dem Kopf gegen eine baumelnde Glühbirne."

translation.en: Want to take the next part?
"All that time, the rat steadied the bulb
translation.de: "Die ganze Zeit hielt die Ratte die Birne

translation.en: and pulled the chain, and light flickered."
translation.de: und zog an der Kette, und Licht flackerte."

translation.en: There was a lynching in Little Rock. You hear about that?
translation.de: In Little Rock wurde jemand gelyncht. Schon gehört?

translation.en: -[mouthing] Not now. -What happened?
A Black man was accused of assaulting two white women.
translation.de: Ein Schwarzer Mann soll zwei weiße Frauen angegriffen haben.

translation.en: What did he do to them?
It's less a question of "what" than "if," Ted.
translation.de: Die Frage ist nicht "was", sondern "ob", Ted.

translation.en: -But they lynched the man anyway. -Exactly.
Junior, go brush your teeth.
They…
-chased him… -Brian.
They caught him, hung him from a telephone pole, and they shot him.
translation.de: …hängten sie ihn an einen Telefonmast und erschossen ihn.

translation.en: -But why, Papa? -Because they hate us, son.
I said, Brian, not now.
Come here.
Seems as though we can't discuss these things
translation.de: Scheinbar können wir solche Sachen nicht diskutieren,

translation.en: without distressing the ladies of our family.
translation.de: ohne die Damen der Familie zu peinigen.

translation.en: -All right? -Yeah.
Go brush those teeth, hmm?
[Irene] I know I take being a mother rather seriously.
translation.de: Ja, ich nehme die Mutterrolle sehr ernst.

translation.en: I know I'm wrapped up in my boys and the running of my house.
translation.de: Ich bin ständig mit den Jungs und dem Haus beschäftigt.

translation.en: But I don't think there's anything funny in that.
[Clare] Oh, Rene, I know.
You're so good. So perfect.
translation.de: Du bist so gut. So perfekt.

translation.en: You say that like it's a bad thing.
translation.de: Das klingt, als sei das schlecht.

translation.en: Let's sit here a minute.
I like hearing him play.
Don't think, whatever happens, I'll forget how good you've been to me.
translation.de: Egal, was passiert, denke nie, dass ich je deine Güte vergesse.

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -I mean it.
You see, I…
I don't have proper morals or a sense of duty like you.
translation.de: Ich bin nicht so moralisch oder pflichtbewusst wie du.

translation.en: -You're talking nonsense. -But it's true, Rene.
translation.de: -Du redest Unsinn. -Es ist aber die Wahrheit, Rene.

translation.en: Don't you realize?
I'm not like you one bit.
translation.de: Ich bin kein bisschen wie du.

translation.en: Why, to get the things I want so badly, I'd do anything.
translation.de: Um zu kriegen, was ich will, würde ich alles tun.

translation.en: Hurt anybody.
Throw anything away.
Anything.
I'm not safe.
Clare, stop it.
What you're saying is wrong.
You've always had so much, you haven't given up a thing.
translation.de: Du hattest immer viel, musstest nichts aufgeben.

translation.en: [Irene] Oh, I'm sorry.
Has Mae called?
[sighs] I don't know where she could be.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wo sie ist.

translation.en: Damn Zu taking the night off…
translation.de: Zu hat den ganzen Abend frei…

translation.en: She does have to see her family from time to time.
translation.de: Sie muss auch mal zu ihrer Familie.

translation.en: Oh, but, we're late already and…
translation.de: Aber wir sind schon spät dran und…

translation.en: Well, it is my last night before I leave for Europe.
translation.de: Es ist mein letzter Abend vor Europa.

translation.en: Why don't I stay with the boys and you two go?
translation.de: Ich bleibe bei den Jungs, und ihr beide geht dahin.

translation.en: -[Brian] Really? -I don't mind.
-No, we can't leave you. -Oh, yes, you can.
And it will make the numbers even.
translation.de: Und das sorgt für eine gerade Zahl.

translation.en: Well, now I really have to play bridge.
translation.de: Tja, ich will unbedingt Bridge spielen.

translation.en: -Go on, now. -But I'll miss you, Rene.
No, you won't. Go on. Get.
translation.de: Werde ich nicht. Los. Hau schon ab.

translation.en: Go on, now.
This is where all the talent is.
translation.de: Da steckt all das Talent drin.

translation.en: -[Hugh] Yeah, and the hooch. -[Irene laughs]
Where's Princess tonight?
It's a rarity having the two of you all to myself.
translation.de: Es ist selten, dass ich Sie beide für mich habe.

translation.en: She's in Europe.
Her daughter's in boarding school. Switzerland, of all places.
translation.de: Ihre Tochter ist auf einem Internat. Schweiz, ausgerechnet.

translation.en: -What? -Nothing. Just, uh…
What do you know about Switzerland?
translation.de: Was weißt du über die Schweiz?

translation.en: Well, I shouldn't miss her too much. I find her hard work.
translation.de: Tja, ich vermisse sie nicht so sehr. Sie ist ziemlich anstrengend.

translation.en: Well, some would say the same of you.
True.
But I call it shameless, what she does. Always playing the victim.
translation.de: Aber was sie macht, ist schamlos. Immer das Opfer zu spielen.

translation.en: "Poor little tragic me," etcetera… It's a low way of making yourself popular--
translation.de: "Ich Ärmste", und so weiter. Armseliges Ringen um Popularität.

translation.en: -I don't think that's fair. -I didn't quite finish.
But she does maintain a certain charm.
translation.de: Aber sie hat einen gewissen Charme.

translation.en: Hugh, you hardly know the woman.
translation.de: Hugh, Sie kennen die Frau kaum.

translation.en: -Since she isn't here to defend herself-- -You will?
translation.de: -Da sie sich nicht verteidigen kann… -Tun Sie's?

translation.en: Very chivalrous of you, I'm sure.
-[Irene] Afternoon, Lance. -Irene.
Have to let this dry before we attach it.
translation.de: Das muss vorm Anbringen erst trocknen.

translation.en: This is nice, isn't it? Just us four.
-I'll make some hot chocolate. -Yes, please!
[Ted] No, I want to keep talking about it.
-[Irene] You two look serious. -We're talking about John Carter.
translation.de: -Ihr wirkt ernst. -Es geht um John Carter.

translation.en: The one that got lynched in Little Rock.
translation.de: Der in Little Rock gelyncht wurde.

translation.en: -That again? -[Ted] You gotta know about these things.
-Do I? -Do we have any more nuts?
-I'll see. -I want some too.
You know they did more than just shoot him.
translation.de: Sie haben ihn nicht nur erschossen.

translation.en: They attached his body to a caravan, dragged it through the city.
translation.de: Sie schleiften ihn an einen Wagen gebunden durch die Stadt.

translation.en: -Did you tell your father that? -He told me.
translation.de: -Hast du das deinem Vater erzählt? -Er mir.

translation.en: He did?
I'm old enough not to be spoken to like a child anymore.
translation.de: Ich bin alt genug, um darüber zu reden.

translation.en: [Junior] Thank you for dinner, Mama.
I wish you wouldn't keep talking to them about all that lynching stuff.
translation.de: Du solltest mit ihnen nicht über die Lynchmorde reden.

translation.en: Why?
There'll be time for them to learn about horrible things when they're older.
translation.de: Sie erfahren solche Sachen früh genug, wenn sie älter sind.

translation.en: -Right now, they're safe. -You are absolutely wrong.
If you are determined to have them grow up in this damn country,
translation.de: Wenn sie in dem verdammten Land aufwachsen sollen,

translation.en: the sooner they find out, the better.
translation.de: sollten sie wissen, was sie erwartet.

translation.en: But they're happy. Why ruin that?
translation.de: Aber sie sind glücklich. Warum zerstörst du das?

translation.en: -I want them to stay happy. -Irene.
What is the use in keeping things from them? Hmm?
translation.de: Was nützt es, Dinge vor ihnen zu verheimlichen?

translation.en: We tried to keep them from hearing the word "nigger."
translation.de: Wir bewahrten sie vor dem Wort "Nigger".

translation.en: -Don't use those-- -They found out the hard way.
You are not to talk about the race problem. I won't have it.
translation.de: Ich lasse dieses Thema nicht zu.

translation.en: -It is my house too. They need to know-- -They don't!
translation.de: -Das ist auch mein Haus. Sie müssen… -Nein!

translation.en: They do not.
I don't understand how someone as intelligent as you can be so stupid.
translation.de: Ich verstehe nicht, wie eine so intelligente Frau so dumm sein kann.

translation.en: I wanted to leave this hellish place years ago.
translation.de: Ich wollte die Hölle vor Jahren verlassen.

translation.en: I have been saying we should go away for a bit.
translation.de: Ich sagte doch, wir sollten für eine Weile weggehen.

translation.en: But then you seemed happier having Clare around, so…
translation.de: Aber mit Clare wirktest du glücklicher, also…

translation.en: The hell has Clare got to do with-- Only that we would have gone on a trip but for that.
translation.de: -Was hat Clare damit zu tun? -Sonst wären wir verreist.

translation.en: I gave up that idea because you objected…
-I never objected to having Clare-- -God damn it!
Irene, I'm not talking about Clare.
translation.de: Irene, ich rede nicht über Clare.

translation.en: -It seems-- -I'm not talking about a trip! I am talking about leaving this--
translation.de: -Es scheint… -Keine Reise! Ich will das Land verlassen…

translation.en: It seems to me you are a lot less content with what you've got when she's not here.
translation.de: Es scheint, du bist weniger zufrieden, wenn sie nicht hier ist.

translation.en: [Clare] Not how I see it.No.
I'm getting up.
Don't worry.
-It was good of you to think to call me. -Always the attentive husband.
translation.de: -Gut, dass du mich gerufen hast. -Immer der fürsorgliche Mann.

translation.en: All of those people coming to tea.
translation.de: So viele Leute kommen zum Tee.

translation.en: Thank goodness everything is ready.
-Clare's downstairs. -Clare? How?
I didn't invite her, purposely.
translation.de: Ich lud sie absichtlich nicht ein.

translation.en: Uh, she's been back for a while. Zu's always taking messages,
translation.de: Sie ist schon länger zurück, Zu richtet es aus,

translation.en: and you never seem to respond.
Might a mere man ask why?
This party is for Hugh, and Hugh happens not to care a great deal for her, so…
translation.de: Die Party ist für Hugh, und er mag sie nicht besonders.

translation.en: I didn't ask her.
If you ask me, his dislike has less to do with her
translation.de: Wenn du mich fragst, hat das weniger mit ihr

translation.en: and more to do with the attention she happens to not give him very much of.
translation.de: und mehr damit zu tun, dass sie ihm nicht genug Aufmerksamkeit schenkt.

translation.en: -You love Hugh. -I do.
But you'll admit he has a godlike opinion of himself.
translation.de: Aber du musst zugeben, er hält sich für Gott.

translation.en: I disagree.
He thinks far better of himself than that. [giggles]
translation.de: Er hält sich für was viel Besseres.

translation.en: I'm sorry. It's my fault, Irene.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Ich bin schuld.

translation.en: She seemed hurt at being left out. I told her I was sure you'd forgotten.
translation.de: Sie wirkte gekränkt. Ich sagte, du hast es nur vergessen.

translation.en: But, Brian, I…
You spoke to her, then?
Yes.
Of course you did.
In spite of what I said, Clare does add to any party.
translation.de: Aber davon abgesehen tut Clare jeder Party gut.

translation.en: She's so easy on the eyes.
You won't be long?
-[woman 1] Thank you. -[Irene] Sorry.
[woman 2] We're all discussing La Josephine. You've seen her, I presume?
translation.de: Wir reden über La Josephine. Du hast sie gesehen?

translation.en: -[Irene] Josephine Baker? No, never. -[man] You're missing out.
translation.de: -Josephine Baker? Nein, nie. -Da hast du was verpasst.

translation.en: [Irene] She may have been in Shuffle Along when I saw it,
translation.de: Vielleicht sah ich sie mal in Shuffle Along,

translation.en: but I can't remember.
[woman 2] I much prefer her to Ethel Waters.
[Irene] Ethel Waters is awfully good.
Hello, Felise, so glad you made it. [Felise] Oh, come back. Irene.
translation.de: -Felise, schön, dass du da bist. -Komm zurück. Irene!

translation.en: -You haven't sat down all afternoon. -[Irene breathing heavily]
translation.de: Du läufst die ganze Zeit herum.

translation.en: [Felise] I wanna talk to you.
Come out of it, whatever it is. You look like the second gravedigger.
translation.de: Komm endlich zu dir. Du siehst aus wie der zweite Totengräber.

translation.en: [Irene] I'm not quite feeling up to par.
-The weather, I guess. -[Felise] Buy yourself an expensive frock.
translation.de: -Ist wohl das Wetter. -Kauf dir ein teures Kleid, Kind.

translation.en: It always helps.
I have been trying to get her alone all afternoon. Clare!
translation.de: Ich will sie schon den ganzen Nachmittag allein sprechen. Clare!

translation.en: You look too divine, sitting so quiet like a painting!
translation.de: Du siehst himmlisch aus, wie ein Gemälde.

translation.en: -Come over for a gathering next month. -You must!
[Clare] I was telling Dave I just finished his book.
translation.de: Ich habe gerade Daves Buch ausgelesen.

translation.en: -[Felise] You've read his books? -Of course, I've read all of 'em!
So sorry, Rene, I must've pushed you. Clumsy of me.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, ich habe Sie wohl geschubst. Ich Tollpatsch.

translation.en: Don't tell me, it's priceless and irreplaceable?
translation.de: Ich hoffe, sie war nicht unbezahlbar und unersetzlich.

translation.en: No, you didn't push me, I'm quite sure.
translation.de: Nein, Sie haben mich ganz sicher nicht geschubst.

translation.en: That pot was the ugliest thing
that your ancestors, the charming Confederates, ever owned.
translation.de: was Ihre Vorfahren, die Konföderierten, je besaßen.

translation.en: I've forgotten how many thousands of years ago it was
translation.de: Ich vergaß, wie viele Tausende Jahre es her ist,

translation.en: that Brian's great-great-great-great uncle owned it…
What I mean is I never figured out how to get rid of it till just this minute.
translation.de: Ich will damit sagen, ich wusste nicht, wie ich sie loswerden soll, bis eben.

translation.en: Inspiration! I had only to break it, and I was free of it forever.
translation.de: Inspiration. Ich musste sie zerbrechen, um frei zu sein.

translation.en: -[chuckles] Simple. -Well done.
-[Hugh] My lovely. -[woman] Oh, that was wonderful.
Well done.
Brian, thank you so much for a tea party that…
translation.de: Brian, vielen Dank für die Teeparty.

translation.en: -Bye, Rene. -…can never be matched.
-Staying for dinner? -Oh, I can't tonight.
Oh. Right. Too bad. Brian's got work, anyway.
translation.de: Klar. Schade. Brian muss eh arbeiten.

translation.en: -So glad to see you. -So long.
Thank you so much. We had a marvelous time.
translation.de: Vielen Dank. Wir hatten eine fabelhafte Zeit.

translation.en: Good to see you. Thank you.
-[Junior] Then I beat Patrick in a race. -[Brian] Hat! Hat!
Race you up the steps! Can't catch me.
[Ted] I'm not letting you have it. No!
translation.de: Das lasse ich nicht zu. Nein!

translation.en: Evening.
[Felise] My goodness.
-Heavens, my eyes are watering. -I fear my fingers might fall off.
translation.de: -Meine Augen tränen. -Meine Finger fallen gleich ab.

translation.en: -[giggling] -This wind is brutal!
[John] Excuse me.
Oh, Mrs. Redfield! How do you do?
That was abrupt.
You just passed the only person I ever met while disguised as a white woman.
translation.de: Das war eben der einzige Mensch, dem ich mal als Weiße begegnete.

translation.en: Hello, Central Quincy 5-4-7-3.
Hello, is Mrs. Bellew in? It's urgent.
translation.de: Hallo, ist Mrs. Bellew da? Es ist dringend.

translation.en: No?
Never mind.
It isn't that urgent.
I'll try again later.
[Brian] Irene.
What are you doing? It's freezing.
translation.de: Was machst du? Es ist kalt.

translation.en: Are we going to that party with Clare?
translation.de: Gehen wir mit Clare zur Party?

translation.en: Have you ever been up to the sixth floor?
translation.de: Warst du jemals im sechsten Stock?

translation.en: [Clare] Of course! My father was a janitor.
[Clare] Back in the old days when every ramshackle apartment had its own elevator.
translation.de: In den guten alten Zeiten, als jedes Haus einen Fahrstuhl hatte.

translation.en: [Brian] Elevator?
-Oh, you can't mean we have to walk up? -[chuckles] All the way to the top.
translation.de: -Wir müssen doch nicht hochlaufen? -Bis nach ganz oben.

translation.en: [Clare] Oh, Lord!
Why on earth would anyone live here?
translation.de: Wie kann man hier freiwillig wohnen?

translation.en: She says it discourages the casual visitor. -Says she'd rather be dead than bored! -Huh.
translation.de: Es hält Gelegenheitsbesucher ab. Sie wäre lieber tot als gelangweilt.

translation.en: Damn these thin shoes.
What is it, Rene?
Have you ever thought of what you'd do if John found out?
translation.de: Weißt du, was du tust, wenn John es rausfindet?

translation.en: Yes.
[Brian] Don't fall by the wayside before the fourth floor.
translation.de: Nicht vorm dritten Stock auf der Strecke bleiben.

translation.en: I absolutely refuse to carry anybody up more than two flights.
translation.de: Ich trage niemanden mehr als zwei Stockwerke.

translation.en: And? What would you?
I'd do what I want more than anything right now.
translation.de: Das, was ich am liebsten tun würde.

translation.en: I'd come up here to live.
In Harlem. With you.
Lord.
Come on, slowpoke.
[Dave] …dinner at Eddie's, then Leroy's, then Smalls.
translation.de: …Abendessen im Eddie's, dann Leroy's, dann Smalls.

translation.en: Those dancers seem strange to anyone else?
-No, honey, just the liquor. -That's why I've given it up.
translation.de: -Nein, nur der Alkohol. -Darum hab ich aufgehört.

translation.en: -Since this morning? -Yes.
And nothing in the least exciting has happened--
-You're welcome. -Thank you.
I wouldn't. I've heard the drinks here aren't safe.
translation.de: Die Drinks hier sollen nicht sicher sein.

translation.en: [Dave] Irene, have you taken a vow not to laugh again?
translation.de: Irene, hast du geschworen, nie mehr zu lachen?

translation.en: No. It's simply the rest of you are so clever, I'm speechless.
translation.de: Nein. Ihr seid nur so klug, dass ich sprachlos bin.

translation.en: You haven't a drink. What will you take? Ginger ale and three drams of scotch.
translation.de: -Du hast keinen Drink. Was willst du? -Gingerale und drei Dram Scotch.

translation.en: Scotch first, then the ice, then the ginger ale.
translation.de: Erst Scotch, dann Eis, dann Gingerale.

translation.en: [Felise] Don't attempt to mix that yourself, Dave, honey.
translation.de: Mixe den nicht selbst, Dave, Liebling.

translation.en: -Have the butler make it. -[Irene] And the footman, would you?
translation.de: -Ruf den Butler her. -Und den Lakaien, ja?

translation.en: -Yes, it's a perfect evening. -Good.
[Dave] Don't stand there. Aren't you freezing?
translation.de: Steh nicht da. Frierst du nicht?

translation.en: [Dave] Come. Come talk to me, or at least listen to me gabble.
translation.de: Komm, rede mit mir, oder hör mir beim Brabbeln zu.

translation.en: -[man 1] Evening, can I help you? -[John] Let me in.
[man 1] Perhaps you've come to the wrong house. [John] I know where I am. Let me in.
translation.de: -Sie sind hier falsch. -Ich weiß, wo ich bin. Ich will rein.

translation.en: [man 2] Which apartment are you looking for, sir?
-[John] My wife is in there. -[man 1] Your wife?
No, sir, she's not here. I guarantee it.
translation.de: Nein, Sir, sie ist garantiert nicht hier.

translation.en: -[man 2] Excuse me, I think you're wrong. -[John] I'm not wrong.
-[man 1] Do not come in! -[man 2] Sir, calm down.
-[man 3] What's going on? -[John] Out of my way.
Can I help you?
[John] I've been to the Redfields' and I know she's with them.
translation.de: Ich war bei den Redfields. Sie sind zusammen.

translation.en: Ralph, where's my drink?
[John] Save yourself the trouble and get out of my way.
translation.de: Gehen Sie lieber aus dem Weg.

translation.en: I know what you're doing here. I know.
translation.de: Ich weiß, was Sie hier tun.

translation.en: I'm Redfield. What the devil's the matter--
translation.de: Ich bin Redfield. Was ist los…

translation.en: You don't get to tell me what to do! Any of you people!
translation.de: Sie haben mir nichts zu sagen! Niemand hier!

translation.en: [Dave] It's best you leave.
You liar!
[Felise] Careful. You're the only white man here.
translation.de: Vorsicht. Sie sind der einzige Weiße hier.

translation.en: You dirty liar.
-Good Lord Jesus! -[indistinct chatter]
-[man 1] Hurry. -[man 2] Quickly!
Quickly!
Go downstairs.
[man 1] Her husband's just sitting there?
[man 2] I don't know.
[man 1] You don't know? [man 2] I don't know for sure if she's dead.
translation.de: -Was soll das bedeuten? -Ich weiß nicht, ob sie tot ist.

translation.en: [man 3] I imagine he was just trying to protect his wife. [man 4] Doesn't strike me as particularly unusual.
translation.de: Er wollte sicher seine Frau beschützen. Finde ich nicht so ungewöhnlich.

translation.en: [Irene] Is she…
Is she…
Irene, you mustn't.
You'll make yourself sick.
[man 3] I mean, she just tumbled over and was gone.
translation.de: Sie kippte einfach um und war weg.

translation.en: [Dave] Irene was there beside her, weren't you? [officer] This lady here?
translation.de: -Irene stand neben ihr, oder? -Diese Dame hier?

translation.en: You're sure she fell?
Her husband didn't give her a shove or anything, as Dr. Redfield here seems to think?
translation.de: Ihr Mann hat sie nicht geschubst, wie Dr. Redfield hier glaubt?

translation.en: No. I'm quite sure she just fell before anyone could stop her.
translation.de: Nein. Sie fiel, bevor sie jemand halten konnte.

translation.en: It was so quick, I…
-Careful. -[officer] Anyone else notice anything?
-You mustn't. -[officer] None of you saw how she fell?
-[Felise] He was upset, that's true. -[officer] So an accident?
translation.de: -Er war wütend, das stimmt. -Also ein Unfall?

translation.en: [Felise] I guess an accident, yeah.
translation.de: Es war wohl ein Unfall, ja.

translation.en: That's what I thought.
[whispers] I love you.
[officer] Death by misadventure, I'm inclined to believe.
Let's go up and have a look at that window.
translation.de: Sehen wir uns oben das Fenster an.
